query: atrial fibrillation recurrence rates maintenance therapy amiodarone beta-blockers long-term outcomes rhythm maintenance
title: Meta-Analysis Comparing the Relative Risk of Adverse Events for Amiodarone Versus Placebo
authors: Mohammed Ruzieh, Morgan K. Moroi, Nader M. Aboujamous, Mehrdad Ghahramani, Gerald V. Naccarelli, John Mandrola, Andrew J. Foy
reference: Ruzieh, M., Moroi, M. K., Aboujamous, N. M., Ghahramani, M., Naccarelli, G. V., Mandrola, J., & Foy, A. J. (2019). Meta-analysis comparing the relative risk of adverse events for amiodarone versus placebo. The American Journal of Cardiology, 124(12), 1889-1893.
